code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{getMovieCategory}from'../../redux/actions';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MovieCatalog=function MovieCatalog(){var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-gray-200 flex flex-col  border-b border-t border-l  border-indigo-600",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"my-6 text-center underline text-indigo-700",children:"Movie "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"my-6 text-center text-gray-200",children:"Category"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"my-4 bg-gradient-to-t from-pink-800 via-indigo-800 to-purple-800 mx-5 rounded-full p-1 hover:bg-pink-900",onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(getMovieCategory('upcoming'));},children:"Up Coming"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"my-4 bg-gradient-to-t from-pink-800 via-indigo-800 to-purple-800 mx-5 rounded-full p-1 hover:bg-pink-900 ",onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(getMovieCategory('top_rated'));},children:"Top Rated"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"my-4 bg-gradient-to-t from-pink-800 via-indigo-800 to-purple-800 mx-5 rounded-full p-1 hover:bg-pink-900",onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(getMovieCategory('now_playing'));},children:"Now Playing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"my-4 bg-gradient-to-t from-pink-800 via-indigo-800 to-purple-800 mx-5 rounded-full p-1 hover:bg-pink-900",onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(getMovieCategory('popular'));},children:"Popular"})]});};export default MovieCatalog;
